entities.description: Reasons for using tranquilizers, including pain relief, relaxation, experimental, and other motivational factors.
Instances of tranquilizer misuse, specifically when used without a prescription.
Misuse of tranquilizers in the past year without a prescription, but obtained by prescription.
Misuse of any benzodiazepine tranquilizers in the past year.

relationships.description: Links the use of tranquilizers with the underlying reasons for their use.
Indicates instances of tranquilizer misuse, particularly without a prescription.
Shows whether there was any misuse of tranquilizers in the past year without a prescription, but obtained by prescription.
Indicates the misuse of benzodiazepine tranquilizers in the past year.
